titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission for fiscal years 2026 through 2027, and for other purposes
To authorize appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission for fiscal years 2026 through 2029, and for other purposes.
To authorize appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission for fiscal years 2026 through 2027, and for other purposes
Federal Maritime Commission Reauthorization Act of 2025
Federal Maritime Commission Reauthorization Act of 2025

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 119-401.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 349.

action.text: Mr. Johnson (SD) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4183.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To
